description: At first I thought I met an angel. That´s how cute and innocent this 19 years old boy looked. Too bad that beautiful face can´t save one from stupid mistakes. The boy got into trouble but instead off pulling himself together he started to make one stupid decision after another. Lending 8 000 at a huge interest? Why not. Getting a consumer loan to buy a new TV? Sure thing. Thank god I got there before he could totally wreck his life. He needed 40 000. Which is not a small amount in the Czech Republic. Lucky for him, I was in a generous mood that day. I even taught him a valuable life lesson: If you´re really desperate, you will do anything to save your skin. When I was done with him, he was barely able to sit down.
title: Debt Dandy 127
